name: Jalapeno Popper Chicken
author: LBR8
summary: This dish makes a satisfying meal out of a favorite appetizer.
ingredients: 4 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
directions: Stir together the cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, and jalapenos in a small bowl
Cut a pocket horizontally through the thickest side of each chicken breast, and fill with 1/4 of the cheese mixture
Roll the chicken breasts in bread crumbs to coat
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-high heat, and cook chicken breasts until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 8 minutes per side
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
